title: Proper Hemp Co.
description: Proper Hemp Co. is a direct-to-consumer CBD brand focused on sustainable products and premium customer experience. Led the development of their comprehensive brand identity and e-commerce strategy, creating a cohesive digital presence from packaging to platform.

impact: Launched successful D2C brand with sustainable packaging and comprehensive digital presence
